interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: A24 Cleansing Oil - Makeup Remover, Deep Cleansing, Non-Stripping, 99.75% Natural Ingredients, Vegan Formula, Ideal for All Skin Types… (Cleansing Oil to Foam)
Review Date: 2022/01/02
Store: A24
Product Description: ['A24 Oil to Foam Cleansing Oil is a product that combines “oil and moisture balance” and “powerful cleansing”. When it comes into contact with water, it is a cleansing oil that changes from a light oil texture to a dense foam texture. Its unique transforming texture will result in a thoroughly cleansed and balanced skin to enhance efficacy of the skin care products to follow. 6 premium plant based oils are a powerful lipid soluble antioxidant to soften, moisturize and nourish the skin. It also helps remove dirt and impurities deep within pores.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'A24', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Material Feature': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'A24'}
Review Text: This makeup remover is really oily. Leaves my face feeling really oily. Also, it does not remove waterproof eye makeup well at all.
Review Title: Super oily
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Colloidal Oatmeal Lotion by Lucky Super Soft, Moisturizing Lotion with Natural Oatmeal, Non-Scented, Fragrance Free, No Parabens and Phatalates, Perfect for Face and Whole Body, 12 bottles, 12 fl.oz.
Lucky Super Soft
{'Brand': 'Lucky Super Soft', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '144.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body, Face', 'Package Dimensions': '13.46 x 8.35 x 6.57 inches; 10.58 Pounds'}
These are absolutely perfect for my dry skin! I am on accutane and have really dry skin. This has been a perfect solution. I like it better than comparable brands like aveeno. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and NOT oily. It has a slight oatmeal scent that smells good but it is not overpowering at all. It feels like such quality going into my skin. I am obsessed. It is nice it comes in such a large quantity because I have a bottle at work at home and everywhere!
Perfect!
YUHFERA Press on Nails Kit 30Pcs Fake Nails Short Coffin Nail Tips with Designs Solid Color Full Cover False Nails Set Artificial Acrylic Nails for DIY Nail Art Salon Women Girls Gift(Blue bird)
YUHFERA
{'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'YUHFERA', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 1.06 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '785382442227'}
Ok. I do not have very long finger nails. These press on nails were shorter than my actual nail. It looked terrible because my finger nail was poking out the other side. I didn’t want to clip my nails down just for a set of press on nails that were way too short. I am not into super long gaudy nails, but these are not even a natural length. However, if you are happy with the length, the stickers included to press the mails on to are pretty good! They lasted well and came off my nail easily when I needed them off.
Great stickers, super short nails
Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
Gryph & IvyRose
{'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'}
This lotion has a very subtle scent. If that is what you are into, it is a great purchase. It does moisturize well and I feel confident letting my daughter use it since it is made of quality materials. The little bottle is cute and easy to use. I love the fact that it is made of natural ingredients.
Very subtle scent
21pcs with storage box for girls big bow hairpin ribbon full cover flower hairpin baby toddler hair accessories
Havtyyise
{'Brand': 'Havtyyise', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Babies', 'Material': 'Linen', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '3.55 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 0.53 Ounces'}
The little box these come in is absolutely adorable! I love that they come in a cute little storage bin. I also love that they come with duplicates of each one for little pigtails. These are perfect for a toddler and they have nice fabric underneath to keep them from pulling the hair!
So sweet!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Care Preference:** User continues to prioritize moisturizing products suitable for dry skin, particularly those formulated without harsh chemicals and designed for sensitive skin.
- **Ingredient Focus:** Maintains a preference for natural ingredients like oatmeal, shea butter, and coconut oil, while valuing fragrance-free formulations that are free from parabens and sulfates.
- **Product Form:** Exhibits a strong preference for lotions that offer hydration without a greasy feel, and appreciates effective application tools.
- **Quantity Preference:** Enjoys larger product sizes for practicality and sustainability in their skincare routine.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Displays loyalty to natural, cruelty-free brands and values high-quality materials in formulations.
- **Review Behavior:** Provides mostly positive feedback but has shown critical insights recently, particularly regarding product effectiveness; appreciates functional and aesthetically pleasing accessories while highlighting practicality and ingredient quality.
- **Nail Care Preference:** Prioritizes practicality and functionality in nail and hair care products that perform well in everyday scenarios.
- **Emerging Interests:** Shows a developing interest in hair accessories that balance aesthetics with functionality, reflecting a broader appreciation for thoughtfully designed beauty products that offer both style and effectiveness.

The user's recent interaction with a cleansing product indicates a nuanced perspective on cleansing formulations, showcasing a willingness to explore new products while maintaining standards for performance and quality.
